name: fakeThunder
tagline: fakeThunder is an unofficial Thunder(aka Xunlei) client for OS X.
body:
## Download fakeThunder

**Application: Download Version 2.0.12**

Click the three button on the left side do fetch source code.

## Features

### 1. Task Synchronized with the server http://lixian.xunlei.com.
### 2. High downloading speed than official Thunder client.
### 3. Support http/ftp/magnet/ed2k/torrent link.

![fakeThunder](http://ww4.sinaimg.cn/large/635877bcjw1e9xto87kukj20q80h3whw.jpg)


## Feedback


If you have any question, please submit comment [here](http://blog.martianz.cn) or mention me on [Google+](https://plus.google.com/100204491389909955903).

Technical issues are also welcomed to be submitted on [GitHub](https://github.com/MartianZ/fakeThunder/issues/new).
